      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Description copied from interface: IStatemachine
        Checks if the statemachine is active. A statemachine is active if it was entered. It is inactive if it has not been entered at all or if it was exited.
        Specified by:
        isActive in interface IStatemachine
        See Also:
        IStatemachine#isActive()

      • isFinal

        public boolean isFinal()
        Always returns 'false' since this state machine can never become final.
        Specified by:

        public void setTimer(ITimer timer)
        Set the ITimer for the state machine. It must be set externally on a timed state machine before a run cycle can be correct executed.
        Parameters:
        timer -
